CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Considering the sufficiently high I SC values of this system , more promising photovoltaic performance is thought to be achievable by using other fullerene derivatives with high LUMO energy levels , such as bis-PCBM 13 or Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH.

Let's think step by step.

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. bis-PCBM 13
2. Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the updated "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. bis-PCBM 13
2. Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH

I removed "I SC" and "LUMO" as they are not material names, but rather scientific concepts mentioned in the context of the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the table with the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| bis-PCBM 13 |
| Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Considering the sufficiently high I SC values of this system , more promising photovoltaic performance is thought to be achievable by using other fullerene derivatives with high LUMO energy levels , such as bis-PCBM 13 or Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. I SC (sufficiently high I SC values) - refers to the current-voltage characteristics of the system, specifically the short-circuit current.
2. LUMO energy levels (high LUMO energy levels) - refers to the energy level of the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO) of the fullerene derivatives.
3. bis-PCBM 13 (bis-PCBM 13) - refers to a specific fullerene derivative with a high LUMO energy level.
4. Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH (Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH) - refers to another specific fullerene derivative with a high LUMO energy level.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material property in the given paragraph:

1. I SC (sufficiently high I SC values) - refers to the current-voltage characteristics of the system, specifically the short-circuit current.
2. LUMO energy levels (high LUMO energy levels) - refers to the energy level of the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO) of the fullerene derivatives.

The following entities do not directly refer to the value of material property and can be removed:

1. bis-PCBM 13 (bis-PCBM 13) - refers to a specific fullerene derivative, but does not directly describe its property values.
2. Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH (Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH) - refers to another specific fullerene derivative, but does not directly describe its property values.

Therefore, the entities that clearly refer to the value of material property in the given paragraph are:

1. I SC (sufficiently high I SC values)
2. LUMO energy levels (high LUMO energy levels)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| I SC (sufficiently high I SC values) |
| LUMO energy levels (high LUMO energy levels) |

Note that the entities are presented in the same words as in the original paragraph.
